mapper.select: select userid, pd_no, rating_price, rating_delivery, rating_design, rating_durability, img, content, writedate, s_no from review order by writedate desc
select count(pd_no) from review where pd_no=#{pd_no}
mapper.insert: insert into review(userid, pd_no, rating_price, rating_delivery, rating_design, rating_durability, img, content, writedate, s_no) values(userid=#{userid}, pd_no=#{pd_no}, rating_price=#{rating_price}, rating_delivery=#{rating_delivery}, rating_design=#{rating_design}, rating_durability=#{rating_durability}, img=#{img}, content=#{content}, writedate=#{writedate}, s_no=#{s_no})
